<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mobile Finisher](/Feats.aspx?ID=1549) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Finisher" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=322" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You attack in motion. Stride and then Strike. You can use Mobile Finisher while [Burrowing](/Actions.aspx?ID=93), [Climbing](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), [Flying](/Actions.aspx?ID=94), or [Swimming](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.
name: Mobile Finisher
